nodes.text: The Pasa Novo campaign was a campaign that took place on Pasa Novo sometime during the reign of the Galactic Empire. During the campaign, the Free Ryloth Movement sent some of their tacticians to help out, one of which was the Twi'lek Kaasha Bateen. Whilst she was on Pasa Novo, Bateen met Lando Calrissian, who was smuggling gear and refugees from the battlefield. Eventually Bateen was called back to Ryloth as the FRM needed her to help them liberate Tann.
